Key Match Events: The Twins rallied from a 4-0 deficit to tie the game 4-4 in the 8th inning, but ultimately lost 8-6 in the 10th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins' bullpen ERA over the last nine games ranks 23rd in the majors.
Others: The loss sends the Twins 2.5 games behind the Royals and Guardians, who are tied atop the AL Central.
